PHRASE.LANG: The most effective way to mark your territory that doesn't involve odors or moisture. [#Legal]
Moyen le plus efficace de marquer votre territoire sans odeurs ni traces liquides. [#Legal]
Die wirksamste Methode, Ihr Territorium ohne Gerüche oder Feuchtigkeit zu markieren. [#Legal]
Il metodo più efficace per segnare il tuo territorio senza sostanze umide o odorose. [#Legal]
La forma más efectiva de marcar tu territorio sin olores ni humedades. [#Legal]
The most effective way to mark your territory that doesn't involve odors or moisture. [#Legal]
